title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct total consumption in a time period

1 point is earned for the correct time period and liquid measure

This gives the total consumption, in billions of gallons, during the years 1985 and 1986.

0/2 "rate of consumption"
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct total consumption in a time period

1 point is earned for the correct time period and liquid measure

This gives the total consumption, in billions of gallons, during the years 1985 and 1986.

0/2 "rate of consumption"

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct total consumption in a time period

1 point is earned for the correct time period and liquid measure

This gives the total consumption, in billions of gallons, during the years 1985 and 1986.

0/2 "rate of consumption"

The student response earns two of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct total consumption in a time period

1 point is earned for the correct time period and liquid measure

This gives the total consumption, in billions of gallons, during the years 1985 and 1986.

0/2 "rate of consumption"
